name: Women of 2020
content:
Description: Data on the BBC's list of 100 inspiring and influential women from around the world for 2020.

[Source](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/blob/master/data/2020/2020-12-08/readme.md) and second [source](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-55042935)

Columns:

 * name (string): name of the woman
 * img Enrollment (string): image url for a headshot
 * category (string): category for the award
 * country (string): country of residence of the woman
 * role (string): role/career
 * description (string): description of the woman and their achievements
